tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE workout_leaderboard (
    athlete_id INT,
    workout_date DATE,
    workout_type VARCHAR(50),
    workout_duration_minutes INT,
    workout_performance_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE workout_performance (
  workout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  workout_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT,
  distance_km DECIMAL(5,2),
  calories_burned INT
);

CREATE TABLE WorkoutSessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT NOT NULL,
    session_date DATE NOT NULL,
    workout_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration_minutes INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_id INT NOT NULL,
    steps_taken INT NOT NULL,
    calories_burned INT NOT NULL,
    distance_miles FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    athlete_gender VARCHAR(10),
    athlete_age INT,
    athlete_country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workout_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    workout_type VARCHAR(50),
    workout_goal VARCHAR(50),
    workout_intensity VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    workout_id INT,
    metric_date DATE,
    metric_time TIME,
    metric_distance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE leaderboards (
    leaderboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workout_id INT,
    leaderboard_date DATE,
    top_athlete_id INT,
    top_athlete_metric DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    workout_id INT,
    completion_time TIMESTAMP,
    calories_burned INT
);
